main event: On April 7, 1955, multiple witnesses reported sighting unidentified flying objects in New York City, including a dark disk-shaped object moving at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5-10 seconds before the object disappeared., Witnesses included a businessman and three private citizens., The objects were described as oblong and circular in shape and were seen flashing bright blue-green lights., One of the witnesses was a retired military officer who observed a large elongated object hovering silently., The event was documented under Project Blue Book, a program by the U.S. Air Force.
location: New York City, New York, USA
witness description: multiple citizens, including a businessman and a retired military officer
